```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
library(dbplyr)
```

```{r}
con <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), 
                      dbname = "testsqlite")
copy_to(dest = con, 
        df = mtcars, 
        name = "mtcars")

dbListTables(con)
```

```{sql, connection=con}
SELECT *
FROM mtcars
```
